Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Feast of the Cross

Comment.Language: The following psali is said for the Raising of the Evening Incense on the Watos days

Text.Language: Ari'alin w~ nipictoc: m~mainou] I/couc Pi,~rictoc: eybe p~taio~ m~pic~tauroc: pise eyouab n~a~yanatoc.
Sing, O belovedÂ / believers of Jesus Christ,Â / in honor of the cross,Â / the holy immortal wood.

Today, there is joyÂ / in heaven and on earthÂ / through the life-giving crossÂ / of Christ, King of the heavens.

Title.Language: Psali Adam for the Feast of the Cross

Comment.Language: The following psali is said on the Adam days of the Feast of the Cross

Text.Language: Al/ywc tennah]: e~rok w~ I/couc Pi,~rictoc: p~cwt/r Ps/ri m~Vnou]: nem pekc~tauroc.
Truly, we believe in You,Â / O Jesus Christ,Â / the Savior, the Son of God,Â / and in Your cross.
